description: Main application source file for an event management backend using FastAPI. It sets up the app, middleware, database initialization, and routes for authentication, events, RSVPs, and notifications.

classes.name: FastAPI
classes.description: Main web application instance from FastAPI framework, configured for the event management API.

methods.name: _get_cors_origins
methods.description: Retrieves CORS origins from environment variables, defaulting to localhost:3000.

methods.name: lifespan
methods.description: Async context manager for initializing the database and setting up app lifespan events.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Endpoint for performing health checks of the service.
